data.title: Is Manisha Koirala filing for divorce?
data.meta_description: The buzz is that Manisha Koirala has made a final decision to separate from her husband and has moved back to Mumbai.
data.text:
Highlights

The buzz is that Manisha Koirala has made a final decision to separate from her husband and has moved back to Mumbai.

This doesn't come really as a surprise. Manisha, who tied the knot with businessman Samrat Dahal in June 2010, seemed to have problems with the marriage soon after.

Just six months after the wedding, she had posted on the social networking site, Facebook that she wanted to divorce her husband.

Later, she said that she got carried away in a fit of rage and changed her mind. And then again she called her husband her worst enemy on the same site.

Now, however, it seems like she has finally decided on breaking the marriage. She is said to have settled down in Mumbai.

Recently, she invited her friends for a party at her residence and at the party, she is said to have announced that she's going through the process of divorcing her husband. She is also hoping to make a comeback on the big screen.

Mumbai: The buzz is that Manisha Koirala has made a final decision to separate from her husband and has moved back to Mumbai.
